3ï¸âƒ£ JavaScript (script.js) - Interactive Features

js
// Function to Add Books to Library
function addBook() {
    let bookTitle = document.getElementById("bookTitle").value;
    let bookList = document.getElementById("bookList");
    if (bookTitle) {
        let listItem = document.createElement("li");
        listItem.textContent = bookTitle;
        bookList.appendChild(listItem);
        document.getElementById("bookTitle").value = "";
    }
}

// Function to Lend Books
function lendBook() {
    let lendBookTitle = document.getElementById("lendBookTitle").value;
    let borrowerName = document.getElementById("borrowerName").value;
    let lendList = document.getElementById("lendList");
    if (lendBookTitle && borrowerName) {
        let listItem = document.createElement("li");
        listItem.textContent = `"${lendBookTitle}" lent to ${borrowerName}`;
        lendList.appendChild(listItem);
        document.getElementById("lendBookTitle").value = "";
        document.getElementById("borrowerName").value = "";
    }
}

// Function to Add Events
function addEvent() {
    let eventName = document.getElementById("eventName").value;
    let eventList = document.getElementById("eventList");
    if (eventName) {
        let listItem = document.createElement("li");
        listItem.textContent = eventName;
        eventList.appendChild(listItem);
        document.getElementById("eventName").value = "";
    }
}

// Function to Add Blogs
function addBlog() {
    let blogContent = document.getElementById("blogContent").value;
    let blogList = document.getElementById("blogList");
    if (blogContent) {
        let listItem = document.createElement("li");
        listItem.textContent = blogContent;
        blogList.appendChild(listItem);
        document.getElementById("blogContent").value = "";
    }
}
